sentences: Ahaa, nüüd ma mõistan! Ahaa, seal sa oledki!
Ahaa, ma aiman, mida ta kavatseb.
context: The word 'oledki' appears to be part of the interjection 'ahaa' which is used to express realization, understanding, confirmation, or sometimes schadenfreude. In the context provided, it's used when someone suddenly understands something, as in 'Ahaa, nüüd ma mõistan!' (Ah, now I understand!). The 'oledki' part seems to be emphasizing the realization about someone else's situation: 'Ahaa, seal sa oledki!' which translates to something like 'Ah, so that's where you are!' or 'Ah, so there you are!'
